StrikePrice.title: STRIKE PRICE
StrikePrice.explanation: A strike price is the set price at which an option contract can be bought or sold when it is exercised.

Call.explanation: A call option is a financial contract that gives the option buyer the right but not the obligation to buy an asset at the strike price at a specific point in time.

Put.explanation: A put option is a derivative instrument which gives the holder the right to sell an asset, at a specified price, by a specified date to the writer of the put.

Lido.title: Lido
Lido.explanation: Lido is a DeFi asset staking protocol.

stETH.explanation: {{collateralAssetUnit}} is the deposit token that represents a user's share of the their ETH on the Ethereum beacon chain.

Benqi.title: Benqi
Benqi.explanation: BENQI is a decentralized non-custodial liquidity market protocol on Avalanche, enabling users to effortlessly lend, borrow, and earn interest with their assets.

sAVAX.explanation: sAVAX is the deposit token that represents a user's share of the their AVAX on the Avalanche blockchain.

yvToken.explanation: {{collateralAssetUnit}} is the deposit token that represents a user's share of the {{assetUnit}} yVault.

LiquidityPool.rTokenCTA: Stake your {{rToken}} tokens in the {{rToken}} staking pool to earn $RBN rewards.

baseAPY.title: Base APY
baseAPY.description: Base APY are the estimated APY from staking vault tokens. This does not account additional boost from veRBN holding.

poolRewards.title: Weekly Pool Rewards
poolRewards.description: Estimated amount of RBN to be distributed for the current week.

rewardsBooster.title: Rewards Booster
rewardsBooster.description: The multiplier applied to the base rewards of veRBN holders.

boostedRewards.title: Boosted Rewards
boostedRewards.description: The additional rewards veRBN holders earn for staking their rTokens. Base rewards can be boosted by up to 2.5X.

LiquidityMining.stakingWarningMessage: If you stake rTokens before locking your RBN, your boosted rewards won't be applied until you apply boost or claim RBN rewards.
